condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: IR17: Young children's school readiness improved through increased access to quality pre-school education programmes in at least 20 deprived districts

description.narrative: National Frameworks for in-service Kindergarten (KG) training and development of supplementary reading materials for early grades operationalized. KG education staff trained using the in-service framework; and 50 supplementary readers developed for early grades. KG formative assessment informed prioritization of pre-primary education in the education sector plan preparation. | Status:Met | As-of Date:21/12/2017
